segments.text: Home at last . Tonight we have a lot of homework though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you saying we don ’ t have time to watch our favorite show tonight ? Jane , you know I really don ’ t like our teacher all that much . He gives far too much homework . He criticizes me in front of everyone all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To tell the truth , I don ’ t really like him either . He ’ s kind of boring and not very active . He always looks unhappy too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think we should be talking about him like this behind his back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably not . After all he is our teacher . We should try to find something nice to say . If you can ’ t say something nice you shouldn ’ t say anything at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I absolutely agree . It ’ s getting dark . We should finish our homework now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I want to take a shower first , I ’ m exhausted .
segments.speaker: S2
